sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"转动，旋转"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: rotate, revolve, roll, spin, turn, whirl, circle
means: rotate ： 侧重指物体围绕自己的轴或中心旋转，即自转。
revolve ： 强调指物体围绕本身以外的中心旋转，即公转。
roll ： 指某物在平面上滚动或翻滚。
spin ： 指沿内轴迅速而连续旋转，或沿外部一个点作快速圆周运转。
turn ： 普通用词，中性，含义不确切，可指作一个圆周运动或连续地作圆周运动，也可指仅是沿圆的弧形转动。
whirl ： 指旋转或作圆周运动，侧重急速或力量。

word_mean: 环，圈：圆形，圆形结构或组成部分。另见annules及ring
用于测量角度的分度圆盘。

sentence.Network_en: The process is not a circle but rather a spiral.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个过程不是一个圆周运动而是螺旋上升型的。

sentence.Network_en: He is a cultured man with a wide circle of friends.
They formed a circle and sang "Auld Lang Syne"
sentence.Network_cn: 他们围成一个圆圈，唱起了《友谊地久天长》。

jx.jx_en_mean: (N. Amer. informal)(of a group) unite in defence of a common interest
jx.jx_cn_mean: (北美， 非正式)（集团）为保障共同利益团结起来

jx.jx_en_mean: return to a past position or situation, especially in a way considered to be inevitable
jx.jx_cn_mean: 尤指不可避免地）兜了一圈，仍回到原位

jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)在原地兜圈子；长时间反复进行毫无进展

lj.lj_ly: the discussion went round and round in circles.
lj.lj_ls: 长时间反复讨论毫无进展。

phrase.cizu_name: the wheel has turned (或come) full circle

jx.jx_en_mean: the situation has returned to what it was in the past, as if completing a cycle
jx.jx_cn_mean: 事情转了一大圈，还是回到了原来的样子

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, from Old French cercle, from Latin circulus 'small ring', diminutive of circus 'ring'

entry.def: A circle is a shape consisting of a curved line completely surrounding an area. Every part of the line is the same distance from the centre of the area.

example.ex: The flag was red, with a large white circle in the center...
example.tran: 旗子是红色的，中央有个白色大圆圈。

example.ex: I wrote down the number 46 and drew a circle around it.
example.tran: 我写下46这个数字，又画了个圆将它圈起来。

entry.def: A circle of something is a round flat piece or area of it.

example.tran: 切出四块圆形油酥面饼。

entry.def: A circle of objects or people is a group of them arranged in the shape of a circle.

example.ex: The monument consists of a circle of gigantic stones...
example.tran: 纪念碑由一圈巨石组成。

example.ex: We stood in a circle holding hands.
example.tran: 我们站成一圈，手牵着手。

entry.def: If something circles an object or a place, or circles around it, it forms a circle around it.

example.ex: This is the ring road that circles the city.
...the long curving driveway that circled around the vast clipped lawn.
example.tran: 围绕着大片修剪过的草坪的长长的弧形车道

entry.def: If an aircraft or a bird circles or circles something, it moves round in a circle in the air.

example.ex: The plane circled, awaiting permission to land...
example.tran: 飞机在天上盘旋，等候着陆许可。

example.ex: There were two helicopters circling around.
example.tran: 有两架直升机在空中盘旋。

entry.def: To circle around someone or something, or to circle them, means to move around them.

example.ex: Emily kept circling around her mother...
example.tran: 埃米莉围着她妈妈转个不停。

example.ex: The silent wolves would track and circle them.
example.tran: 悄无声息的群狼会跟踪并包围他们。

entry.def: If you circle something on a piece of paper, you draw a circle around it.

example.ex: Circle the correct answers on the coupon below.
example.tran: 将下面参赛券上的正确答案圈出来。

entry.tran: (指朋友或有相同兴趣或职业的人组成的)圈子，界
entry.def: You can refer to a group of people as a circle when they meet each other regularly because they are friends or because they belong to the same profession or share the same interests.

example.ex: He has a small circle of friends...
Alton has made himself fiercely unpopular in certain circles.
example.tran: 奥尔顿把自己搞得在某些圈子里极其不受欢迎。

entry.def: In a theatre or cinema, the circle is an area of seats on the upper floor.

entry.tran: 兜了一圈回到原地;循环
entry.def: If you say that you have come full circle or have turned full circle, you mean that after a long series of events or changes the same situation that you started with still exists.

example.ex: We've come full circle and dark-blue jeans are once again the height of style.
example.tran: 风水轮流转，时下最流行的又是深蓝色牛仔裤了。

entry.tran: 在原地兜圈子;原地踏步;毫无进展
entry.def: If you say that someone is going round in circles or around in circles, you mean that they are not achieving anything because they keep coming back to the same point or problem.

means.word_mean: 1. ellipse in which the two axes are of equal length; a plane curve generated by one point moving at a constant distance from a fixed point;

sentences.sentence: "he calculated the circumference of the circle"

means.word_mean: 2. an unofficial association of people or groups;
3. something approximating the shape of a circle;

sentences.sentence: "the chairs were arranged in a circle"
"he drove an extra lap just for insurance"

means.word_mean: 5. a road junction at which traffic streams circularly around a central island;

sentences.sentence: "the accident blocked all traffic at the rotary"

means.word_mean: 7. a curved section or tier of seats in a hall or theater or opera house; usually the first tier above the orchestra;

sentences.sentence: "they had excellent seats in the dress circle"

auth_sentence.content: This circle came to be known as the Pythagoreans.
auth_sentence.res_content: This circle came to be known as the Pythagoreans.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This circle came to be known as the Pythagoreans.

auth_sentence.content: This could actually form part of a virtuous circle.
auth_sentence.res_content: This could actually form part of a virtuous circle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This could actually form part of a virtuous circle.

auth_sentence.content: He cannot allow things to go full circle.
auth_sentence.res_content: He cannot allow things to go full circle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He cannot allow things to go full circle.

stems_affixes.word_buile: circuit[n.环行;电路]+ous……的→adj.迂回的,绕圈子的
circ圆,环+ular表形容词→adj.圆的;循环的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 圆周, 圆形物, 派系, 循环
stems_affixes.word_buile: circ圆,环+le→圆周, 圆形物→围, 环绕
circulate[v.循环,流通]+ion动作或状态→n.循环,流通,发行额
circ圆,环+us表名词→[巡回演出的]马戏团
circ圆,环+le→圆周, 圆形物→围, 环绕
circ圆,环+ulate=ate表动词→绕圈走→循环

Sentence.sentence: It aroused a lot of interest in the scientific circles.
They often have to seek jobs outside the academic circle.
They represent the latest fashion in the business circles.
What is the finding of a new study by CIRCLE?

sentences.en: They saw the birds were circling again.
sentences.cn: 他们看见鸟儿又在盘旋。

sentences.en: The plane circled the airport before landing.
sentences.cn: 飞机着陆以前在机场上空盘旋。

jushi.english: The novel has reached a wide circle of readers.
jushi.chinese: 这本小说已拥有广泛的读者群。

jushi.english: Are we going to sit in the circle or in the stalls?
jushi.chinese: 我们是坐楼座还是正厅前排的座位?

jushi.english: The reading circle had ceased its activities long ago.
jushi.chinese: 这个读书会早已停止了活动。
